data.title: French Alternative Energies and Atomic Energy Commission (CEA)
data.meta_description: The French Atomic Energy and Alternative Energies Commission (CEA) is a public research organization of a scientific, technical and industrial nature (EPIC)....
data.text:
The French Atomic Energy and Alternative Energies Commission (CEA) is a public research organization of a scientific, technical and industrial nature (EPIC). A major player in research, development and innovation, the CEA is active in four areas: defense and security, low-carbon energy (nuclear and renewable), technological research for industry and fundamental research (material and life sciences). With its recognized expertise, the CEA is involved in setting up collaborative projects with numerous academic and industrial partners.
